```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
```

```{r}
data <- read_csv("../data/processed/data.csv")
data
```

## Count Model

```{r}
cm <- lmer(lf_count_log ~ narr_freq_log + else_freq_log + (1|lang) + (1|field), data)
summary(cm)
```


## Entropy Model

```{r}
em <- lmer(lf_entropy ~ narr_freq_log + else_freq_log + (1|lang) + (1|field), data)
summary(em)
```
